QuestData.Title: The Blood Elves
QuestData.Description: You must eliminate... the blood elf... threat. Find out... what they're... up to!$B$BThey're on the... ridge behind me.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill 10 Blood Elf Scouts then return to Tolaan in the Shadow Ridge of Ammen Vale.
QuestData.CompletionText: There are too many of them... We must whittle them down or else the survivors will have no chance against them.
QuestData.RewardText: These blood elves mean to kill us all. How are we to divert them from this course?
